name: Indy (waffledork)
description:
Fuel your engines!

You've got 1 minute to maneuver your vehicle along the track and do your best to keep off the grass. Once time is up, you'll be shown how long you were able to keep to the road. With 3 tracks and 3 different speeds, try to see if you can make master each combination.

Use the left and the right arrow keys to steer.
